title: Mably
description: A group of Gallo-Roman houses was identified on the banks of the Loire river in 1824, with some archaeological investigation in 1962-68. Associated finds date the site to the second century A.D. A Gallo-Roman villa was also identified at the site.

properties.description: Representative modern point location based on OpenStreetMap of the commune of Mably where PECS reports the investigation of a Gallo-Roman vicus, the ancient name of which is unknown.
properties.title: OSM location of Mably
